```{r setup}
library(chaoUtility)
```

## MAIN FUNCTION: phyLengthbyT()


## EXAMPLES

```{r }
library(chaoUtility)
data(phybird)
bird.abu <- phybird$abun
bird.lab <- rownames(phybird$abun)
bird.phy <- phybird$chaophytree

bird.phy$treeH

phyLengthbyT(Ts=c(90,75,55), phy=bird.phy, datatype="abundance")


```
